book.synopsis: Chloe Thomas is going to the prom. Of course, she doesnat have a date, she needs a dress, and sheas the last person anyone expects to see there. But her two oldest friends asked her to go, and she said yes. Right away things start to fall apart. Laura and Jace are too busy with their own preparations to help Chloe, her areala friends think sheas insane, and her parents are so excited that she canat even be in the same room with them. Why on earth did she agree to do this? With drama, humor, and a touch of prom magic, Blake Nelson delivers a story as memorable as prom itself.
book.dimensions: Height: 7 Inches, Length: 4.25 Inches, Weight: 1.1 Pounds, Width: 0.73 Inches
